metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: The <feOffset> filter is also used to create a drop shadow effects The idea is to take an SVG graphic, and move it a little bit in the xy plane.
content.html: The <feOffset> filter is also used to create a drop shadow effects The idea is to take an SVG graphic, and move it a little bit in the xy plane.

content.text: The first example offsets a rectangle (with <feOffset> ), then blend the original on top of the offset image (with <feBlend> ):
content.html: The first example offsets a rectangle (with <feOffset>), then blend the original on top of the offset image (with <feBlend>):

syntaxHighlighting.text: <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" />
width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" /

content.code:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<defs>

<filter id="f1" width="120" height="120">

<feOffset in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" 
dy="20" />

<feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="offOut" />

</filter>

</defs>

<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" />

</svg>

syntax_highlighting.text: <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" />
width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" /

content.code_html:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <filter id="f1" width="120" height="120">
      <feOffset in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" dy="20" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="offOut" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" />
</svg>

syntax_highlighting_data.text: <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" />
width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f1)" /

content.text: Now, the offset image can be blurred (with <feGaussianBlur> ):
content.html: Now, the offset image can be blurred (with <feGaussianBlur>):

syntaxHighlighting.text: <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" />
width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" /

content.code:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<defs>

<filter id="f2" width="120" height="120">

<feOffset in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" 
dy="20" />

<feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />

<feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />

</filter>

</defs>

<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" />

</svg>

syntax_highlighting.text: <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" />
width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" /

content.code_html:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <filter id="f2" width="120" height="120">
      <feOffset in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" dy="20" />
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f2)" />
</svg>

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" />

width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" /

content.code:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>

<filter id="f3" width="120" height="120">
      
<feOffset in="SourceAlpha" dx="20" dy="20" />
      
<feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />
      <feBlend 
in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />
    </filter>
  
</defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" />
</svg>

syntax_highlighting.text:
<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" />

width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" /

content.code_html:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <filter id="f3" width="120" height="120">
      <feOffset in="SourceAlpha" dx="20" dy="20" />
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f3)" />
</svg>

content.text: Treat the Shadow as a Color Matrix
Now, treat the shadow as a color matrix with the <feColorMatrix> element:
content.html: Now, treat the shadow as a color matrix with the <feColorMatrix> element:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" />

width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" /

content.code:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    
<filter id="f4" width="120" height="120">
      <feOffset 
in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" dy="20" />
      <feColorMatrix 
type="matrix" values = "0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 1 0"/>
      
<feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />
      <feBlend 
in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />
    </filter>
  
</defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" />
</svg>

syntax_highlighting.text:
<rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" />

width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" 
  fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" /

content.code_html:
<svg height="150" width="150" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <filter id="f4" width="120" height="120">
      <feOffset in="SourceGraphic" dx="20" dy="20" />
      <feColorMatrix type="matrix" values = "0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 1 0"/>
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect width="90" height="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="yellow" filter="url(#f4)" />
</svg>
